name: Superior
hint: The largest of the Great Lakes and the largest freshwater lake by surface area in the world

name: Michigan
hint: The only Great Lake entirely within the United States, bordered by Michigan, Wisconsin, Illinois, and Indiana

name: Huron
hint: The second-largest of the Great Lakes, bordered by Michigan and Ontario, Canada

name: Erie
hint: The fourth-largest and shallowest of the Great Lakes, bordered by four US states and Ontario

name: Ontario
hint: The smallest and easternmost of the Great Lakes, connected to the Atlantic via the St. Lawrence River

name: Great Bear
hint: The largest lake entirely within Canada, located in the Northwest Territories on the Arctic Circle

name: Great Slave
hint: The deepest lake in North America, in Canada's Northwest Territories, source of the Mackenzie River

name: Winnipeg
hint: A large lake in Manitoba, Canada, a remnant of the prehistoric glacial Lake Agassiz
